title: Beer or no Beer™ Drinking Game
creator: BONB Drinking Game

extendedInfo.description: WARNING: Beer or no Beer may cause you to roll over in the morning and see something really scary(whose name, and/or species you can't remember).Beer or no Beer. The unique drinking game which will either transform you into a beer expert or will get you and your friends completely wasted! Enough stupid cardgames based on pure randomness! This Drinking Game already includes over 1000 Beer Brands and Fake Brands from all over the world ensuring many drunk nights with your friends!âââââHow it works:The app shows random beer brands from all over the world. One player starts by deciding wether the displayed beer brand exists or not. If the player is right he can continue playing or pass the Smartphone to the next person. But if a person guesses wrong he has to drink as many times as it says. The amount a person has to drink depends on how many times each person has guessed right before.âââââTara: "Love it"chaelli: "Cool idea! I imagine a beer-evening with a couple of friends - this game definitely is a must!"Danusanth: "BEER BEER BEER BEER :D what a happy life;) nice app! i had funXD and i hope i will never be able to answer everything right;)"Fabian: "Realy nice app!"âââââFeatures:- completely for free!- three drinking levels.- Country Flag from the beer brand is displayed.- See pictures and reviews about the beer brands.- Send your own beer brands or own fake brands for the drinking game!!- Optimized for new and old Android Devices (Especially HTC Desire, HTC One X, Samsung Galaxy SII and Samsung Galaxy SIII)- No annoying Menu Button at the bottom of the HTC One X!!- many funny fake brands and real beer brands.âââââapptaggs: Beer brands, fake brands, quiz, guide, party, countries, flags, drinking, beer, drink, cards, bar, game, games, party, drinking game, dice, shots, college games, university drinking, student games, wasted, night, irish, drikke-spil, jeu Ã  boire, juomapeli, ÏÎ±Î¹ÏÎ½Î¯Î´Î¹ ÏÏÏÎ¹Î¼Î¿, beber, juego de tomar, saufen, sauf, alkoholâââââpopular included Beer Brands:Amstel Beer, Grolsch, Heineken beer, Kronenbourg, Mythos Beer, Alfa Beer, New Castle Brown Ale, Guinness Draught, Budweiser, San Miguel, Laughing Dog Dogzilla, Wasatch Golden Nectar, Anheuser Bush Beer, Duff Beer, Miller Beer, Coors Light, SchÃ¼tzengarten Bier, FeldschlÃ¶sschen Lager, Augustiner, Bitburger Pilsener, Clausthaler, Erdinger Weissbier, Beck's Bier, Tuborg, Delirium Nocturnum, Hoegarden Blanche, Stella Artois, Carlsberg,Faxe, Tuborg, Appenzeller, Bud beer, Samuel Adams
